NOM: Millénium: Les hommes qui n'aimaient pas les femmes
RESUME: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for 40 years by young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander.

NOM: Les Aventures de Tintin : Le Secret de la Licorne
RESUME: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.
Soon after moving into their seemingly idyllic new home, a family learns of a brutal crime committed against former residents of the dwelling.
